00013 double r9Weights_class::GetPtWeight(double PtEle_){
00014   r9weights_map_t::const_iterator r9weights_itr =  r9weights.find("R9PtWeightAllAll");  
00015   if(r9weights_itr==r9weights.end()){
00016     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Pt weight histogram not found!" << std::endl;
00017     return -1;
00018   } else return (--(r9weights_itr->second.upper_bound(PtEle_)))->second;
00019 
00020 }
00021 
00022 double r9Weights_class::GetWeight(double etaEle_, double R9Ele_){
00023 #ifdef DEBUG
00024   std::cout << "[DEBUG] GetWeight: " << etaEle_ << "\t" << R9Ele_ << std::endl;
00025 #endif
00026 
00027     double r9Weight=1.;
00028     TString categoryName;
00029 
00030     if(fabs(etaEle_) < 1.) categoryName="EBlowEta";
00031     else if(fabs(etaEle_) >= 1. && fabs(etaEle_) <= 1.479) categoryName="EBhighEta";
00032     else if(fabs(etaEle_) > 1.479 && fabs(etaEle_) < 2) categoryName="EElowEta";
00033     else if(fabs(etaEle_) >= 2) categoryName="EEhighEta";
00034     else{
00035       std::cerr << "Category not found: "
00036                 << "etaEle = " << etaEle_ << "\t"
00037                 << "R9Ele = " << R9Ele_ << std::endl;
00038       return 0;
00039     }
00040     if (R9Ele_>=0.94) categoryName+="Gold";
00041     else //if (R9Ele_<0.94 ) 
00042       categoryName+="Bad";
00043 
00044     if(categoryName.Sizeof()>1){ // altrimenti non e' delle categorie definite sopra
00045       std::vector<TString> WeightCat_vec;
00046       WeightCat_vec.push_back("R9EtaWeight"); // weights of the eta distribution
00047       WeightCat_vec.push_back("R9Weight");    // weights of the r9 distribution
00048 
00049       r9weights_map_t::const_iterator r9weights_itr; // iterator pointing to one histogram
00050       for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator itrV=WeightCat_vec.begin();
00051           itrV!=WeightCat_vec.end();
00052           itrV++){
00053         TString hist_prefix = *itrV;
00054         if(r9weights.count(hist_prefix+categoryName)==0){
00055           std::cerr << "[ERROR]: " << hist_prefix+categoryName << " not found in file " << std::endl;
00056           std::cerr << etaEle_ << "\t" << R9Ele_ << std::endl;
00057          
00058           exit(1);
00059           continue;
00060         }
00061 
00062         r9weights_itr = r9weights.find(hist_prefix+categoryName);
00063 #ifdef DEBUG
00064         std::cout << hist_prefix << "\t" << categoryName << "\t";
00065 #endif
00066 
00067         r9weight_map_t::const_iterator itr; // first element less than x
00068        if(hist_prefix.Contains("Eta")){
00069          itr=--(r9weights_itr->second.upper_bound(fabs(etaEle_))); // first element less than x
00070        }else {
00071          itr=--(r9weights_itr->second.upper_bound(fabs(R9Ele_))); // first element less than x
00072        }
00073        float r9Weight_0=itr->second;
00074 #ifdef DEBUG
00075        std::cout << etaEle_ << "\t" << R9Ele_ << "\t" << r9Weight_0 << std::endl;
00076 #endif
00077        if (r9Weight_0<0){
00078          std::cerr << "[ERROR] weight < 0" << std::endl;
00079          exit(1);
00080        }
00081        r9Weight*=r9Weight_0; // mi assicuro che il peso non sia nullo
00082        
00083        
00084       } // altrimenti lascio invariato r9Weight
00085 #ifdef DEBUG
00086       std::cout << std::endl;
00087 #endif
00088     }
00089 
00090   return r9Weight;
00091 }

00095 void r9Weights_class::ReadFromFile(std::string filename){
00096   std::cout << "R9 REWEIGHTING:: Using file " << filename << std::endl;
00097  
00098   f_r9  = new TFile(filename.c_str(),"READ");
00099 
00100   f_r9->cd();
00101    
00102   std::cout << "[INFO] File: " << filename << " opened" << std::endl;
00103   TList *KeyList = f_r9->GetListOfKeys();
00104   std::cout << "[INFO] Number of entries in file: " << KeyList->GetEntries() << std::endl;
00105   for(int i =0; i <  KeyList->GetEntries(); i++){
00106     
00107     TH1F *h = (TH1F *)((TKey *)KeyList->At(i))->ReadObj(); 
00108     //    TString keyName = (KeyList->At(i))->GetName();
00109     if(h==NULL) std::cerr << "[ERROR] histogram null from file: " << filename << std::endl;
00110     TString keyName = h->GetName();
00111     //h->Scale(1./h->Integral());
00112 
00113     // if the electron category is not yet defined, add it
00114     if (r9weights.count(keyName)==0){
00115       r9weight_map_t t;
00116       std::pair<TString, r9weight_map_t> p(keyName,t);
00117       r9weights.insert(p);
00118     } else{
00119       std::cerr << "[ERROR] histogram name found twice:" << keyName << std::endl;
00120       exit(1);
00121     }
00122     // find the map corresponding to the electron category
00123     r9weights_map_t::iterator map_itr=r9weights.find(keyName);
00124     for(int i_bin=1; i_bin <= h->GetXaxis()->GetNbins(); i_bin++){
00125       // fill the weight in the map
00126       std::pair<double, float> p(h->GetXaxis()->GetBinLowEdge(i_bin), h->GetBinContent(i_bin));
00127       map_itr->second.insert(p);
00128 #ifdef DEBUG
00129       std::cout << "[DEBUG] hist= " << keyName << "\t" << i_bin << "\t" 
00130                 << h->GetXaxis()->GetBinLowEdge(i_bin) << "\t" <<h->GetBinContent(i_bin) << "\t" 
00131                 << map_itr->second.lower_bound(h->GetXaxis()->GetBinLowEdge(i_bin))->second
00132                 << std::endl;
00133 #endif
00134 
00135     }
00136     //    std::cout << keyName << "\t" << h->Integral() << std::endl;
00137     //    current_dir.cd();
00138     //    current_dir.ls();
00139     //    r9HistMap[keyName]=(TH1F *) h->Clone(); // dal momento che chiudo il file e' bene farne una copia
00140     //    if(r9HistMap[keyName]!=h) std::cerr << "[ERROR] " << std::endl;
00141     //    r9HistMap[keyName]->Print();
00142   }
00143   
00144   f_r9->Close();
00145 
00146   return;
00147 }

00149 
00150 // tree is the input MC tree
00151 // fastLoop = false if for any reason you don't want to change the branch status of the MC tree
00152 TTree *r9Weights_class::GetTreeWeight(TChain *tree,  bool fastLoop, TString etaElebranchName, TString R9ElebranchName, TString ptElebranchName){
00153   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00154   
00155   Float_t weight[2]={0.};
00156   Float_t ptWeight[2]={0.};
00157   TTree *newTree = new TTree("r9Weight","");
00158   newTree->Branch("r9Weight", weight, "r9Weight[2]/F");
00159   newTree->Branch("ptWeight", ptWeight, "ptWeight[2]/F");
00160   if(fastLoop){
00161     tree->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00162     tree->SetBranchStatus(etaElebranchName,1);
00163     tree->SetBranchStatus(R9ElebranchName,1);
00164     tree->SetBranchStatus(ptElebranchName,1);
00165   }
00166 
00167   Float_t etaEle[2];
00168   Float_t R9Ele[2];
00169   Float_t PtEle[2];
00170   tree->SetBranchAddress(etaElebranchName, etaEle);
00171   tree->SetBranchAddress(R9ElebranchName, R9Ele);
00172   tree->SetBranchAddress(ptElebranchName, PtEle);
00173 
00174   // loop over tree 
00175   Long64_t nentries=tree->GetEntriesFast();
00176 #ifdef DEBUG
00177   nentries=10;
00178 #endif
00179 
00180   std::cout << "[STATUS] Get R9WeightTree for tree: " << tree->GetTitle() 
00181             << "\t" << "with " << nentries << " entries" << std::endl;
00182   std::cerr << "[00%]";
00183   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry< nentries; ientry++){
00184     tree->GetEntry(ientry);
00185     weight[0] = GetWeight(etaEle[0], R9Ele[0]); 
00186     weight[1] = GetWeight(etaEle[1], R9Ele[1]); 
00187     ptWeight[0] = GetPtWeight(PtEle[0]);
00188     ptWeight[1] = GetPtWeight(PtEle[1]);
00189     newTree->Fill();
00190     if(ientry%(nentries/100)==0) std::cerr << "\b\b\b\b" << std::setw(2) << ientry/(nentries/100) << "%]";
00191   }
00192   std::cout << std::endl;
00193   
00194   if(fastLoop) tree->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00195   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00196   //  std::cout << "[WARNING] nPU > nPU max for " << warningCounter << " times" << std::endl;
00197   return newTree;
00198 }
